# delegate

**Instance Property**

The receiver’s delegate.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor unowned(unsafe) var delegate: (any NSDrawerDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

You may find it useful to associate a delegate with a drawer, especially since drawers do not open and close instantly. A drawer’s delegate can better regulate drawer behavior.

## Creating Drawers

- **init(contentSize:preferredEdge:)**: Creates a new drawer with the given size on the specified edge of the parent window.
